[03] etesa~nca daanaadiina.m channa.m gu.naana.m a~n~nama~n~nasambandhaana.m pa~ncadasayugalaadiini pa~ncadasayugalaadisaadhakaani honti. seyyathida.m -- daanasiilayugalena parahitaahitaana.m kara.naakara.nayugalasiddhi, daanakhantiyugalena alobhaadosayugalasiddhi, daanaviiriyayugalena caagasutayugalasiddhi, daanajhaanayugalena kaamadosappahaanayugalasiddhi. daanapa~n~naayugalena ariyayaanadhurayugalasiddhi, siilakhantidvayena payogaasayasuddhidvayasiddhi, siilaviiriyadvayena bhaavanaadvayasiddhi, siilajhaanadvayena dussiilyapariyu.t.thaanappahaanadvayasiddhi, siilapa~n~naadvayena daanadvayasiddhi, khantiviiriyayugalena khamaatejadvayasiddhi, khantijhaanayugalena virodhaanurodhappahaanayugalasiddhi, khantipa~n~naayugalena su~n~nataakhantipa.tivedhadukasiddhi, viiriyajhaanadukena paggahaavikkhepadukasiddhi, viiriyapa~n~naadukena sara.nadukasiddhi, jhaanapa~n~naadukena yaanadukasiddhi ^a^M0.0314^ea^, daanasiilakhantittikena lobhadosamohappahaanattikasiddhi, daanasiilaviiriyattikena bhogajiivitakaayasaaraadaanattikasiddhi, daanasiilajhaanattikena pu~n~nakiriyavatthuttikasiddhi, daanasiilapa~n~naatikena aamisaabhayadhammadaanattikasiddhiiti. eva.m itarehipi tikehi catukkaadiihi ca yathaasambhava.m tikaani ca catukkaadiini ca yojetabbaani.

[03] eva.m chabbidhaanampi pana imaasa.m paaramiina.m catuuhi adhi.t.thaanehi sa"ngaho veditabbo. sabbapaaramiina.m samuuhasa"ngahato hi ^b^cattaari adhi.t.thaanaani,^eb^ seyyathida.m -- saccaadhi.t.thaana.m, caagaadhi.t.thaana.m, upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m, pa~n~naadhi.t.thaananti. tattha adhiti.t.thati etena, ettha vaa adhiti.t.thati, adhi.t.thaanamattameva vaa tanti adhi.t.thaana.m, sacca~nca ta.m adhi.t.thaana~nca, saccassa vaa adhi.t.thaana.m, sacca.m adhi.t.thaanametassaati vaa saccaadhi.t.thaana.m. eva.m sesesupi. tattha avisesato taava lokuttaragu.ne kataabhiniihaarassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahaasattassa pa.ti~n~naanuruupa.m sabbapaaramipariggahato saccaadhi.t.thaana.m. taasa.m pa.tipakkhapariccaagato caagaadhi.t.thaana.m ^a^P0.0323^ea^. sabbapaaramitaagu.nehi upasamato upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m. tehi eva parahitopaayakosallato pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m.

[03] visesato pana yaacakajana.m avisa.mvaadetvaa dassaamiiti pa.tijaananato pa.ti~n~na.m avisa.mvaadetvaa ^a^V0.0292^ea^ daanato daana.m avisa.mvaadetvaa anumodanato macchariyaadipa.tipakkhapariccaagato deyyadhammapa.tiggaahakadaanadeyyadhammakkhayesu lobhadosamohabhayavuupasamato yathaaraha.m yathaakaala.m yathaavidhaana~nca daanato pa~n~nuttarato ca kusaladhammaana.m caturadhi.t.thaanapada.t.thaana.m daana.m. tathaa sa.mvarasamaadaanassa aviitikkamanato dussiilyapariccaagato duccaritavuupasamanato pa~n~nuttarato ca caturadhi.t.thaanapada.t.thaana.m siila.m. yathaapa.ti~n~na.m khamanato, paraaparaadhavikappapariccaagato, kodhapariyu.t.thaanavuupasamanato, pa~n~nuttarato, ca caturadhi.t.thaanapada.t.thaanaa khanti. pa.ti~n~naanuruupa.m parahitakara.nato, visadapariccaagato, akusalavuupasamanato, pa~n~nuttarato ca caturadhi.t.thaanapada.t.thaana.m viiriya.m. pa.ti~n~naanuruupa.m lokahitaanucintanato, niivara.napariccaagato, cittavuupasamanato, pa~n~nuttarato ca caturadhi.t.thaanapada.t.thaana.m jhaana.m. yathaapa.ti~n~na.m parahituupaayakosallato, anupaayakiriyaapariccaagato, mohajapari.laahavuupasamanato, sabba~n~nutaapa.tilaabhato ca caturadhi.t.thaanapada.t.thaanaa pa~n~naa.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0315^ea^ ~neyyapa.ti~n~naanuvidhaanehi saccaadhi.t.thaana.m. vatthukaamakilesakaamapariccaagehi caagaadhi.t.thaana.m. dosadukkhavuupasamehi upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m. anubodhapa.tivedhehi pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m. tividhasaccapariggahita.m dosattayavirodhi saccaadhi.t.thaana.m. tividhacaagapariggahita.m dosattayavirodhi caagaadhi.t.thaana.m. tividhavuupasamapariggahita.m dosattayavirodhi upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m. tividha~naa.napariggahita.m dosattayavirodhi pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m. saccaadhi.t.thaanapariggahitaani caaguupasamapa~n~naadhi.t.thaanaani avisa.mvaadanato pa.ti~n~naanuvidhaanato ca, caagaadhi.t.thaanapariggahitaani saccuupasamapa~n~naadhi.t.thaanaani pa.tipakkhapariccaagato sabbapariccaagaphalattaa ca, upasamaadhi.t.thaanapariggahitaani saccacaagapa~n~naadhi.t.thaanaani kilesapari.laahavuupasamanato kaamuupasamanato kaamapari.laahavuupasamanato ca, pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanapariggahitaani saccacaaguupasamaadhi.t.thaanaani ~naa.napubba"ngamato ~naa.naanuparivattanato caati eva.m sabbaapi paaramiyo saccappabhaavitaa caagaparibya~njitaa upasamopabruuhitaa ^a^P0.0324^ea^ pa~n~naaparisuddhaa. sacca~nhi etaasa.m janakahetu. caago pariggaahakahetu, upasamo parivuddhihetu, pa~n~naa paarisuddhihetu. tathaa aadimhi saccaadhi.t.thaana.m saccapa.ti~n~nattaa, majjhe caagaadhi.t.thaana.m katapa.nidhaanassa parahitaaya attapariccaagato. ante upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m sabbuupasamapariyosaanattaa. aadimajjhapariyosaanesu pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m tasmi.m sati sambhavato asati abhaavato yathaapa.ti~n~na~nca bhaavato.

[03] tattha mahaapurisaa satatamattahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhaavakarehi saccacaagaadhi.t.thaanehi gihibhuutaa ^a^V0.0293^ea^ aamisadaanena pare anugga.nhanti. tathaa attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhaavakarehi upasamapa~n~naadhi.t.thaanehi ca pabbajitabhuutaa dhammadaanena pare anugga.nhanti.

[03] tattha antimabhave bodhisattassa caturadhi.t.thaanaparipuura.na.m. paripu.n.nacaturadhi.t.thaanassa hi carimakabhavuupapattiiti eke. tatra hi gabbhokkanti.thitiabhinikkhamanesu pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena sato sampajaano saccaadhi.t.thaanapaaripuuriyaa sampatijaato uttaraabhimukho sattapadaviitihaarena gantvaa sabbaa disaa oloketvaa saccaanuparivattinaa vacasaa -- ``aggohamasmi lokassa, je.t.thohamasmi lokassa, se.t.thohamasmi lokassaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.31; ma0 ni0 3.207) tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m nadi.

[03] upasamaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena ^a^M0.0316^ea^ ji.n.naaturamatapabbajitadassaavino catudhammapadesakovidassa yobbanaarogyajiivitasampattimadaana.m upasamo. caagaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena mahato ~naatipariva.t.tassa hatthagatassa ca cakkavattirajjassa anapekkhapariccaagoti.

[03] dutiye .thaane abhisambodhiya.m caturadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.nanti keci. tattha hi yathaapa.ti~n~na.m saccaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m abhisamayo, tato hi saccaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. caagaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena sabbakilesuupakkilesapariccaago, tato hi caagaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. upasamaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena paramuupasamappatti, tato hi upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena anaavara.na~naa.napa.tilaabho, tato hi pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.nanti. ta.m asiddha.m, abhisambodhiyaapi paramatthabhaavato.

[03] tatiye .thaane dhammacakkappavattane caturadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.nanti a~n~ne. tattha hi saccaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa dvaadasahi aakaarehi ariyasaccadesanaaya ^a^P0.0325^ea^ saccaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. caagaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa saddhammamahaayaagakara.nena caagaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. upasamaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa saya.m upasantassa paresa.m upasamanena upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa veneyyaana.m aasayaadiparijaananena pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.nanti. tadapi asiddha.m, apariyositattaa buddhakiccassa.

[03] catutthe .thaane parinibbaane caturadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.nanti apare. tatra hi parinibbutattaa paramatthasaccasampattiyaa saccaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggena caagaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. sabbasa"nkhaaruupasamena ^a^V0.0294^ea^ upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.na.m. pa~n~naapayojanaparini.t.thaanena pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m paripu.n.nanti. tatra mahaapurisassa visesena mettaakhette abhijaatiya.m saccaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa saccaadhi.t.thaanaparipuura.namabhibyatta.m, visesena karu.naakhette abhisambodhiya.m pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanaparipuura.namabhibyatta.m, visesena muditaakhette dhammacakkappavattane caagaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa caagaadhi.t.thaanaparipuura.namabhibyatta.m, visesena upekkhaakhette parinibbaane upasamaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa upasamaadhi.t.thaanaparipuura.namabhibyattanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] tatra ^a^M0.0317^ea^ saccaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa sa.mvaasena siila.m veditabba.m. caagaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa sa.mvohaarena soceyya.m veditabba.m. upasamaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa aapadaasu thaamo veditabbo. pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanasamudaagatassa saakacchaaya pa~n~naa veditabbaa. eva.m siilaajiivacittadi.t.thivisuddhiyo veditabbaa. tathaa saccaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena dosaagati.m na gacchati avisa.mvaadanato. caagaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena lobhaagati.m na gacchati anabhisa"ngato. upasamaadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena bhayaagati.m na gacchati anaparaadhato. pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanasamudaagamena mohaagati.m na gacchati yathaa bhuutaavabodhato.

[03] tathaa pa.thamena adu.t.tho adhivaaseti, dutiyena aluddho pa.tisevati, tatiyena abhiito parivajjeti, catutthena asammuu.lho vinodeti. pa.thamena nekkhammasukhappatti, itarehi pavivekaupasamasambodhisukhappattiyo hontiiti da.t.thabbaa. tathaa vivekajapiitisukhasamaadhijapiitisukhaapiitijakaayasukhasatipaarisuddhija- upekkhaasukhappattiyo etehi catuuhi yathaakkama.m honti. evamanekagu.naanubandhehi ^a^P0.0326^ea^ catuuhi adhi.t.thaanehi sabbapaaramisamuuhasa"ngaho veditabbo. yathaa ca catuuhi adhi.t.thaanehi sabbapaaramisa"ngaho, eva.m karu.naapa~n~naahipiiti da.t.thabba.m. sabbopi hi bodhisambhaaro karu.naapa~n~naahi sa"ngahito. karu.naapa~n~naapariggahitaa hi daanaadigu.naa mahaabodhisambhaaraa bhavanti buddhattasiddhipariyosaanaati. evametaasa.m sa"ngaho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^ko sampaadanuupaayo^eb^ti? sakalassaapi pu~n~naadisambhaarassa sammaasambodhi.m uddissa anavasesasambhara.na.m avekallakaaritaayogena, tattha ca sakkaccakaaritaa aadarabahumaanayogena, saataccakaaritaa nirantarayogena, cirakaalaadiyogo ca antaraa avosaanaapajjanenaati. ta.m panassa kaalaparimaa.na.m parato aavi bhavissati. iti catura"ngayogo etaasa.m paaramiina.m sampaadanuupaayo. tathaa mahaasattena bodhaaya pa.tipajjantena sammaasambodhaaya buddhaana.m puretarameva attaa ^a^V0.0295^ea^ niyyaatetabbo -- ``imaaha.m attabhaava.m buddhaana.m niyyaatemii''ti. ta.mta.mpariggahavatthu~nca pa.tilaabhato puretarameva daanamukhe nissajjitabba.m. ``ya.m ki~nci mayha.m uppajjanaka.m jiivitaparikkhaarajaata.m, sabba.m ta.m sati yaacake dassaami, tesa.m pana dinnaavasesa.m eva mayaa paribhu~njitabba''nti.

[03] eva.m ^a^M0.0318^ea^ hissa sammadeva pariccaagaaya kate cittaabhisa"nkhaare ya.m uppajjati pariggahavatthu avi~n~naa.naka.m savi~n~naa.naka.m vaa, tattha ye ime pubbe daane akataparicayo, pariggahavatthussa parittabhaavo, u.laaramanu~n~nataa, parikkhayacintaati ^b^cattaaro daanavinibandhaa,^eb^ tesu yadaa mahaabodhisattassa sa.mvijjamaanesu deyyadhammesu paccupa.t.thite ca yaacakajane daane citta.m na pakkhandati na kamati. tena ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m ``addhaaha.m daane pubbe akataparicayo, tena me etarahi daatukamyataa citte na sa.n.thaatii''ti. so eva.m me ito para.m daanaabhirata.m citta.m bhavissati, handaaha.m ito pa.t.thaaya daana.m dassaami, nanu mayaa pa.tikacceva pariggahavatthu yaacakaana.m pariccattanti daana.m deti muttacaago payatapaa.nii vosaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. eva.m mahaasattassa ^b^pa.thamo daanavinibandho^eb^ hato hoti vihato samucchinno.

[03] tathaa mahaasatto deyyadhammassa parittabhaave sati vekalle ca iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- ``aha.m kho pubbe adaanasiilataaya etarahi eva.m paccayavikalo jaato ^a^P0.0327^ea^, tasmaa idaani mayaa parittena vaa hiinena vaa yathaaladdhena deyyadhammena attaana.m pii.letvaapi daanameva daatabba.m, yenaaha.m aayatimpi daanapaarami.m matthaka.m paapessaamii''ti. so itariitarena ta.m daana.m deti muttacaago payatapaa.nii vosaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. eva.m mahaasattassa ^b^dutiyo daanavinibandho^eb^ hato hoti vihato samucchinno.

[03] tathaa mahaasatto deyyadhammassa u.laaramanu~n~nataaya adaatukamyataacitte uppajjamaane iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- ``nanu tayaa sappurisa u.laaratamaa sabbase.t.thaa sammaasambodhi abhipatthitaa, tasmaa tadattha.m tayaa u.laaramanu~n~ne eva deyyadhamme daatu.m yuttaruupa''nti. so u.laara.m manu~n~na~nca deti muttacaago payatapaa.nii vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. eva.m mahaapurisassa ^b^tatiyo daanavinibandho^eb^ hato hoti vihato samucchinno.

[03] tathaa mahaasatto daana.m dento yadaa deyyadhammassa parikkhaya.m passati, so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- ``aya.m kho bhogaana.m sabhaavo, yadida.m khayadhammataa vayadhammataa ca. api ca ^a^V0.0296^ea^ me pubbe taadisassa daanassa akatattaa eva.m bhogaana.m parikkhayo dissati, handaaha.m yathaaladdhena deyyadhammena ^a^M0.0319^ea^ parittena vaa vipulena vaa daanameva dadeyya.m, yenaaha.m aayati.m daanapaaramiyaa matthaka.m paapu.nissaamii''ti. so yathaaladdhena daana.m deti muttacaago payatapaa.nii vosaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. eva.m mahaasattassa ^b^catuttho daanavinibandho^eb^ hato hoti vihato samucchinno. eva.m ye ye daanapaaramiyaa vinibandhabhuutaa anatthaa, tesa.m tesa.m yathaaraha.m paccavekkhitvaa pa.tivinodana.m upaayo. yathaa ca daanapaaramiyaa, eva.m siilapaaramiaadiisupi da.t.thabba.m.

[03] api ca ya.m mahaasattassa buddhaana.m attasanniyyaatana.m, ta.m sammadeva sabbapaaramiina.m sampaadanuupaayo. buddhaana~nhi attaana.m niyyaatetvaa .thito mahaapuriso tattha tattha bodhisambhaarapaaripuuriyaa gha.tento vaayamanto sariirassa sukhuupakara.naana~nca upacchedakesu dussahesupi kicchesu durabhisambhavesupi sattasa"nkhaarasamupaniitesu anatthesu tibbesu paa.naharesu ``aya.m mayaa attabhaavo buddhaana.m pariccatto, ya.m vaa ta.m vaa ettha hotuu''ti ta.mnimitta.m na kampati na vedhati, iisakampi a~n~nathatta.m na gacchati, kusalaarambhe ^a^P0.0328^ea^ a~n~nadatthu acalaadhi.t.thaanova hoti, eva.m attasanniyyaatanampi etaasa.m sampaadanuupaayo.

[03] api ca samaasato kataabhiniihaarassa attani sinehassa parisosana.m paresu ca sinehassa pariva.d.dhana.m etaasa.m sampaadanuupaayo. sammaasambodhisamadhigamaaya hi katamahaapa.nidhaanassa mahaasattassa yaathaavato parijaananena sabbesu dhammesu anupalittassa attani sineho parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gacchati, mahaakaru.naasamaasevanena pana piyaputte viya sabbasatte sampassamaanassa tesu mettaakaru.naasineho pariva.d.dhati, tato ca ta.mtadavatthaanuruupa.m attaparasantaanesu lobhadosamohavigamena viduuriikatamacchariyaadibodhisambhaarapa.tipakkho mahaapuriso daanapiyavacanaatthacariyaasamaanattataasa"nkhaatehi catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi caturadhi.t.thaanaanugatehi accanta.m janassa sa"ngahakara.nena upari yaanattaye avataara.na.m paripaacana~nca karoti.

[03] mahaasattaana~nhi mahaakaru.naa mahaapa~n~naa ca daanena ala"nkataa, daana.m piyavacanena, piyavacana.m atthacariyaaya, atthacariyaa samaanattataaya ala"nkataa ^a^M0.0320^ea^ sa"ngahitaa ca. tesa.m sabbepi satte attanaa nibbisese katvaa bodhisambhaaresu pa.tipajjantaana.m sabbattha samaanasukhadukkhataaya samaanattataaya siddhi. buddhabhuutaanampi ca teheva catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi caturadhi.t.thaanaparipuuritaabhivuddhehi janassa accantikasa"ngahakara.nena abhivinayana.m sijjhati. daana~nhi ^a^V0.0297^ea^ sammaasambuddhaana.m caagaadhi.t.thaanena paripuuritaabhivuddha.m, piyavacana.m saccaadhi.t.thaanena, atthacariyaa pa~n~naadhi.t.thaanena, samaanattataa upasamaadhi.t.thaanena paripuuritaabhivuddhaa. tathaagataana~nhi sabbasaavakapaccekabuddhehi samaanattataa parinibbaane. tatra hi nesa.m avisesato ekiibhaavo. tenevaaha ``natthi vimuttiyaa naanatta''nti. honti cettha --
[21] ``sacco caagii upasanto, pa~n~navaa anukampako.
[22] sambhatasabbasambhaaro, ka.m naamattha.m na saadhaye..
[21] ``mahaakaaru.niko satthaa, hitesii ca upekkhako.
[22] nirapekkho ca sabbattha, aho acchariyo jino..
[21] ``viratto sabbadhammesu, sattesu ca upekkhako.
[22] sadaa ^a^P0.0329^ea^ sattahite yutto, aho acchariyo jino..
[21] ``sabbadaa sabbasattaana.m, hitaaya ca sukhaaya ca.
[22] uyyutto akilaasuu ca, aho acchariyo jino''ti..

[03] ^b^kittakena kaalena sampaadana^eb^nti? he.t.thimena taava paricchedena cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani mahaakappaana.m satasahassa~nca, majjhimena a.t.tha asa"nkhyeyyaani mahaakappaana.m satasahassa~nca, uparimena pana so.lasa asa"nkhyeyyaani mahaakappaana.m satasahassa~nca. ete ca bhedaa yathaakkama.m pa~n~naadhikasaddhaadhikaviiriyaadhikavasena ~naatabbaa. pa~n~naadhikaana~nhi saddhaa mandaa hoti pa~n~naa tikkhaa, saddhaadhikaana.m pa~n~naa majjhimaa hoti, viiriyaadhikaana.m pa~n~naa mandaa, pa~n~naanubhaavena ca sammaasambodhi adhigantabbaati ^b^a.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ vutta.m.

[03] apare pana ``viiriyassa tikkhamajjhimamudubhaavena bodhisattaana.m aya.m kaalavibhaago''ti vadanti. avisesena pana vimuttiparipaacaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m tikkhamajjhimamudubhaavena yathaavuttakaalabhedena bodhisambhaaraa tesa.m paaripuuri.m gacchantiiti tayopete kaalabhedaa yuttaatipi vadanti. eva.m tividhaa ^a^M0.0321^ea^ hi bodhisattaa abhiniihaarakkha.ne bhavanti ugghaha.tita~n~nuuvipa~ncita~n~nuuneyyabhedena. tesu yo uggha.tita~n~nuu, so sammaasambuddhassa sammukhaa catuppadika.m gaatha.m su.nanto gaathaaya tatiyapade apariyosite eva chahi abhi~n~naahi saha pa.tisambhidaahi ^a^V0.0298^ea^ arahatta.m adhigantu.m samatthuupanissayo hoti, sace saavakabodhiya.m adhimutto siyaa.

[03] dutiyo bhagavato sammukhaa catuppadika.m gaatha.m su.nanto apariyosite eva gaathaaya catutthapade chahi abhi~n~naahi arahatta.m adhigantu.m samatthuupanissayo hoti, yadi saavakabodhiya.m adhimutto siyaa.
[03] itaro pana bhagavato sammukhaa catuppadika.m gaatha.m sutvaa pariyositaaya gaathaaya chahi abhi~n~naahi arahatta.m pattu.m samatthuupanissayo hoti.

[03] tayopete vinaa kaalabhedena kataabhiniihaaro buddhaana.m santike laddhabyaakara.naa ca anukkamena paaramiyo paripuurentaa yathaakkama.m yathaavuttabhedena kaalena sammaasambodhi.m paapu.nanti. tesu tesu pana kaalabhedesu aparipu.n.nesu te ^a^P0.0330^ea^ te mahaasattaa divase divase vessantaradaanasadisa.m mahaadaana.m dentaapi tadanuruupe siilaadisabbapaaramidhamme aacinantaapi pa~nca mahaapariccaage pariccajantaapi ~naatatthacariyaa lokatthacariyaa buddhatthacariyaa paramako.ti.m paapentaapi antaraa ca sammaasambuddhaa bhavissantiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. kasmaa? ~naa.nassa aparipaccanato buddhakaarakadhammaana.m aparini.t.thaanato. paricchinnakaalanipphaadita.m viya hi sassa.m yathaavuttakaalaparicchedena parinipphaaditaa sammaasambodhi tadanantaraa sabbussaahena vaayamantenaapi na sakkaa adhigantunti paaramipaaripuuri yathaavuttakaalavisesena sampajjatiiti veditabba.m.
[03] ^b^ko aanisa.mso^eb^ti? ye te kataabhiniihaaraana.m bodhisattaana.m --
[21] ``eva.m sabba"ngasampannaa, bodhiyaa niyataa naraa.
[22] sa.msara.m diighamaddhaana.m, kappako.tisatehipi..
[21] ``aviicimhi nuppajjanti, tathaa lokantaresu ca.
[22] nijjhaamata.nhaa khuppipaasaa, na honti kaalaka~njikaa..
[21] ``na ^a^M0.0322^ea^ honti khuddakaa paa.naa, upapajjantaapi duggati.m.
[22] jaayamaanaa manussesu, jaccandhaa na bhavanti te..
[21] ``sotavekallataa ^a^V0.0299^ea^ natthi, na bhavanti muugapakkhikaa.
[22] itthibhaava.m na gacchanti, ubhatobya~njanapa.n.dakaa..
[21] ``na bhavanti pariyaapannaa, bodhiyaa niyataa naraa.
[22] muttaa aanantarikehi, sabbattha suddhagocaraa..
[21] ``micchaadi.t.thi.m na sevanti, kammakiriyadassanaa.
[22] vasamaanaapi saggesu, asa~n~na.m nuupapajjare..
[21] ``suddhaavaasesu devesu, hetu naama na vijjati.
[27] nekkhammaninnaa sappurisaa, visa.myuttaa bhavaabhave.
[22] caranti lokatthacariyaayo, puurenti sabbapaaramii''ti.. (dha0 sa0 a.t.tha0 nidaanakathaa; jaa0 a.t.tha0 1.duurenidaanakathaa; apa0 a.t.tha0 1.duurenidaanakathaa) --

[25] eva.m sa.mva.n.nitaa aanisa.msaa. ye ca ``sato sampajaano, aananda, bodhisatto tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa maatukucchi.m okkamatii''tiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 3.200; dii0 ni0 2.17) so.lasa acchariyabbhutadhammappakaaraa, ye ca ``siita.m byapagata.m hoti, u.nha~nca upasammatii''tiaadinaa (bu0 va.m0 2.83) ``jaayamaane kho, saariputta, bodhisatte aya.m dasasahassii lokadhaatu sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhatii''tiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 3.201; dii0 ni0 2.32) ca dvatti.msa pubbanimittappakaaraa, ye vaa pana~n~nepi ^a^P0.0331^ea^ bodhisattaana.m adhippaayasamijjhana.m kammaadiisu vasiibhaavoti evamaadayo tattha tattha ^b^jaatakabuddhava.msaa^eb^diisu dassitaakaaraa aanisa.msaa, te sabbepi etaasa.m aanisa.msaa. tathaa yathaanidassitabhedaa alobhaadosaadigu.nayugalaadayo caati veditabbaa.

[03] api ca yasmaa bodhisatto abhiniihaarato pa.t.thaaya sabbasattaana.m pitusamo hoti hitesitaaya, dakkhi.neyyako garu bhaavaniiyo parama~nca pu~n~nakkhetta.m hoti gu.navisesayogena. yebhuyyena ca manussaana.m piyo hoti, amanussaana.m piyo hoti, devataahi anupaaliiyati, mettaakaru.naaparibhaavitasantaanataaya vaa.lamigaadiihi ca anabhibhavaniiyo hoti, yasmi.m yasmi~nca sattanikaaye ^a^V0.0300^ea^ paccaajaayati, tasmi.m tasmi.m u.laarena va.n.nena u.laarena yasena u.laarena sukhena u.laarena balena u.laarena ^a^M0.0323^ea^ aadhipateyyena a~n~ne satte abhibhavati pu~n~navisesayogato.

[03] appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko, suvisuddhaa cassa saddhaa hoti suvisadaa, suvisuddha.m viiriya.m, satisamaadhipa~n~naa suvisadaa, mandakileso hoti mandadaratho mandapari.laaho, kilesaana.m mandabhaaveneva suvaco hoti padakkhi.naggaahii, khamo hoti sorato, sakhilo hoti pa.tisanthaarakusalo, akkodhano hoti anupanaahii, amakkhii hoti apa.laasii, anissukii hoti amaccharii, asa.tho hoti amaayaavii, athaddho hoti anatimaanii, asaaraddho hoti appamatto, parato upataapasaho hoti paresa.m anupataapii, yasmi~nca gaamakhette pa.tivasati, tattha sattaana.m bhayaadayo upaddavaa yebhuyyena anuppannaa nuppajjanti, uppannaa ca vuupasammanti, yesu ca apaayesu uppajjati, na tattha pacurajano viya dukkhena adhimatta.m pii.liiyati, bhiyyosomattaaya sa.mvegamaapajjati. tasmaa mahaapurisassa yathaaraha.m tasmi.m tasmi.m bhave labbhamaanaa ete sattaana.m pitusamataadakkhi.neyyataadayo gu.navisesaa aanisa.msaati veditabbaa.

[03] tathaa aayusampadaa ruupasampadaa kulasampadaa issariyasampadaa aadeyyavacanataa mahaanubhaavataati etepi mahaapurisassa paaramiina.m aanisa.msaati veditabbaa. tattha ^b^aayusampadaa^eb^ naama tassa.m tassa.m upapattiya.m diighaayukataa cira.t.thitikataa, taaya yathaaraddhaani kusalasamaadaanaani pariyosaapeti, bahu~nca kusala.m upacinoti. ^b^ruupasampadaa^eb^ naama ^a^P0.0332^ea^ abhiruupataa dassaniiyataa paasaadikataa, taaya ruupappamaa.naana.m sattaana.m pasaadaavaho hoti sambhaavaniiyo. ^b^kulasampadaa^eb^ naama u.laaresu kulesu abhinibbatti, taaya jaatimadaadimadamattaanampi upasa"nkamaniiyo hoti payirupaasaniiyo, tena te nibbisevane karoti. ^b^issariyasampadaa^eb^ naama mahaavibhavataa mahesakkhataa mahaaparivaarataa ca, taahi sa"nga.nhitabbe catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi sa"nga.nhitu.m, niggahetabbe dhammena niggahetu~nca samattho hoti.

[03] ^b^aadeyyavacanataa^eb^ naama saddheyyataa paccayikataa, taaya sattaana.m pamaa.nabhuuto hoti, ala"nghaniiyaa cassa aa.naa hoti. ^b^mahaanubhaavataa^eb^ naama aanubhaavamahantataa, taaya parehi na abhibhuuyati, sayameva ^a^M0.0324^ea^ pana pare a~n~nadatthu abhibhavati dhammena samena yathaabhuutagu.nehi ca, evamete aayusampadaadayo mahaapurisassa paaramiina.m aanisa.msaa, saya~nca aparimaa.nassa pu~n~nasambhaarassa parivu.d.dhihetubhuutaa yaanattaye sattaana.m avataara.nassa paripaacanassa ca kaara.nabhuutaati veditabbaa.

[03] ^b^ki.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0301^ea^ ^b^phala^eb^nti? samaasato taava sammaasambuddhabhaavo etaasa.m phala.m, vitthaarato pana dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naasiitianubya~njanabyaamappabhaadianekagu.naga.nasamujjalaruupakaayasampatti- adhi.t.thaanasabalacatuvesaarajjachaasaadhaara.na~naa.naa.t.thaarasaave.nika- buddhadhammappabhutianantaaparimaa.na gu.nasamudayopasobhinii dhammakaayasirii. yaavataa pana buddhagu.naa ye anekehipi kappehi sammaasambuddhenaapi vaacaaya pariyosaapetu.m na sakkaa, idametaasa.m phala.m. vutta~nceta.m --
[21] ``buddhopi buddhassa bha.neyya va.n.na.m, kappampi ce a~n~namabhaasamaano.
[22] khiiyetha kappo ciradiighamantare, va.n.no na khiiyetha tathaagatassaa''ti.. (dii0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.304; 3.141; ma0 ni0 a.t.tha0 2.425; udaa0 a.t.tha0 53; cariyaa0 a.t.tha0 nidaanakathaa).
[03] evamettha paaramiisu paki.n.nakakathaa veditabbaa.

[03] ya.m pana paa.liya.m ^b^``datvaa daatabbaka.m daana''^eb^ntiaadinaa sabbaapi paaramii ekajjha.m dassetvaa parato ^b^``kosajja.m bhayato disvaa''^eb^tiaadinaa pariyosaanagaathaadvaya.m vutta.m, ta.m ^a^P0.0333^ea^ yehi viiriyaarambhamettaabhaavanaa appamaadavihaarehi yathaavuttaa buddhakaarakadhammaa visadabhaava.m gataa sammaasambodhisa"nkhaataa ca attano vimutti paripaacitaa, tehi veneyyaanampi vimuttiparipaacanaaya ovaadadaanattha.m vuttha.m.

[03] tattha ^b^kosajja.m bhayato disvaa, viiriyaarambha~nca khemato^eb^ti iminaa pa.tipakkhe aadiinavadassanamukhena viiriyaarambhe aanisa.msa.m dasseti. ^b^aaraddhaviiriyaa hothaa^eb^ti iminaa viiriyaarambhe niyojeti. yasmaa ca --
[21] ``sabbapaapassa akara.na.m, kusalassa upasampadaa.
[22] sacittapariyodapana.m, eta.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. (dha0 pa0 183; dii0 ni0 2.90; netti0 30, 50) --

[25] sa"nkhepato ^a^M0.0325^ea^. vitthaarato pana sakalena buddhavacanena pakaasitaa sabbaapi sampattiyo ekanteneva sammappadhaanaadhiinaa, tasmaa bhagavaa viiriyaarambhe niyojetvaa ^b^``esaa buddhaanusaasanii''^eb^ti aaha.

[03] tatraaya.m ^a^V0.0302^ea^ sa"nkhepattho -- yvaaya.m sabbasa.mkilesamuulabhaavato sabbaanatthavidhaayakanti kosajja.m bhayato tappa.tipakkhato catuuhi yogehi anupaddavabhaavasaadhanato viiriyaarambha~nca khemato disvaa adhisiilasikkhaadisampaadanavasena viiriyassa aarambho sammappadhaanaanuyogo, tattha ya.m sammadeva niyojana, ``aaraddhaviiriyaa hothaa''ti, esaa buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m anusaasanii anusi.t.thi ovaadoti. sesagaathaasupi iminaava nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] aya.m pana viseso -- ^b^vivaada^eb^nti viruddhavaada.m, chavivaadavatthuvasena vivadananti attho. ^b^avivaada^eb^nti vivaadapa.tipakkha.m mettaavaciikamma.m, mettaabhaavana.m vaa. atha vaa ^b^avivaada^eb^nti avivaadahetubhuuta.m chabbidha.m saara.niiyadhamma.m. ^b^samaggaa^eb^ti avaggaa, kaayena ceva cittena ca sahitaa aviramitaa aviyuttaati attho. ^b^sakhilaa^eb^ti sakkiilaa mudusiilaa, a~n~nama~n~namhi muduhadayaati attho. ^b^esaa buddhaanusaasanii^eb^ti ettha sabbena sabba.m vivaadamanupagamma yadida.m chasaara.niiyadhammaparipuura.navasena samaggavaase niyojana.m, esaa buddhaana.m anusi.t.thiiti yojetabba.m. samaggavaasa~nhi vasamaanaa siiladi.t.thisaama~n~nagataa avivadamaanaa sukheneva tisso sikkhaa paripuuressantiiti satthaa samaggavaase niyojana.m attano saasananti dassesi.

[03] ^b^pamaada^eb^nti pamajjana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pamussana.m akusalesu ca dhammesu cittavossagga.m. vutta~nheta.m -- ``tattha katamo pamaado, kaayaduccarite ^a^P0.0334^ea^ vaa vaciiduccarite vaa manoduccarite vaa pa~ncasu vaa kaamagu.nesu cittassa vosaggo vosaggaanuppadaana.m kusalaana.m vaa dhammaana.m bhaavanaaya asakkaccakiriyataa, asaataccakiriyataa, ana.t.thitakiriyataa, oliinavuttitaa, nikkhittachandataa, nikkhittadhurataa anaasevanaa abhaavanaa abahuliikamma.m...pe0... yo evaruupo pamaado pamajjanaa pamajjitatta.m, aya.m vuccati pamaado''ti (vibha0 846).

[03] ^b^appamaada^eb^nti appamajjana.m. ta.m pamaadassa pa.tipakkhato veditabba.m. atthato hi appamaado naama satiyaa avippavaaso, ``satiyaa avippavaaso''ti ca ^a^M0.0326^ea^ nicca.m upa.t.thitaaya satiyaa eveta.m naama.m. apare pana ``satisampaja~n~nappadhaanaa tathaa pavattaa cattaaro aruupino khandhaa appamaado''ti vadanti. yasmaa pana appamaadabhaavanaa naama visu.m ekaa bhaavanaa natthi. yaa hi kaaci pu~n~nakiriyaa kusalakiriyaa, sabbaa saa appamaadabhaavanaatveva veditabbaa.

[03] visesato pana viva.t.tuupanissaya.m sara.nagamana.m kaayikavaacasikasa.mvara~nca upaadaaya sabbaa siilabhaavanaa, sabbaa samaadhibhaavanaa, sabbaa pa~n~naabhaavanaa, sabbaa kusalabhaavanaa, anavajjabhaavanaa ^a^V0.0303^ea^, appamaadabhaavanaa. ``appamaado''ti hi ida.m pada.m mahanta.m attha.m diipeti, mahanta.m attha.m pariggahetvaa ti.t.thati, sakalampi tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m aaharitvaa appamaadapadassa attha.m katvaa kathento dhammakathiko ``atitthena pakkhando''ti na vattabbo. kasmaa? appamaadapadassa mahantabhaavato. tathaa hi sammaasambuddho kusinaaraaya.m yamakasaalaanamantare parinibbaanasamaye nipanno abhisambodhito pa.t.thaaya pa~ncacattaaliisaaya vassesu attanaa bhaasita.m dhamma.m ekeneva padena sa"ngahetvaa dassento ``appamaadena sampaadethaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.218) bhikkhuuna.m ovaadamadaasi. tathaa caaha -- ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici ja"ngamaana.m paa.naana.m padajaataani, sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti, hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati yadida.m mahantattena, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te appamaadamuulakaa appamaadasamosara.naa, appamaado tesa.m aggamakkhaayatii''ti (ma0 ni0 1.300 thoka.m visadisa.m). tattha appamaadabhaavana.m sikhaappatta.m dassento satthaa ^b^``bhaavetha.t.tha"ngika.m magga''^eb^nti aaha.

[03] tassattho -- yo esa siilaadikhandhattayasa"ngaho sammaadi.t.thipubba"ngamo sammaadi.t.thiaadiina.myeva ^a^P0.0335^ea^ a.t.thanna.m a"ngaana.m vasena a.t.tha"ngiko ariyamaggo, ta.m bhaavetha attano santaane uppaadetha. dassanamaggamatte a.thatvaa upari ti.n.na.m maggaana.m uppaadanavasena va.d.dhetha, eva.m vo appamaadabhaavanaa sikhaappattaa bhavissatiiti. ^b^esaa buddhaanusaasanii^eb^ti yadida.m kusalesu dhammesu appamajjana.m, ta~nca ussukkaapetvaa ariyamaggassa bhaavanaa esaa buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m anusi.t.thi ovaadoti.

[03] iti ^a^M0.0327^ea^ bhagavaa arahattanikuu.teneva cariyaapi.takadesana.m ni.t.thaapesi. ^b^ittha.m suda^eb^ntiaadiisu ^b^ittha^eb^nti kappe ca satasahassetiaadinaa (cariyaa0 1.1) pakaarena. ^b^suda^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ti bhaagyavantataadiihi kaara.nehi bhagavaa. ^b^attano pubbacariya^eb^nti purimaasu akittipa.n.ditaadijaatiisu attano pa.tipattidukkarakiriya.m. ^b^sambhaavayamaano^eb^ti hatthatale aamalaka.m viya sammadeva pakaasento. ^b^buddhaapadaaniya.m naamaa^eb^ti buddhaana.m puraatanakamma.m poraa.na.m dukkarakiriya.m adhikicca pavattattaa desitattaa buddhaapadaaniyanti eva.mnaamaka.m. ^b^dhammapariyaaya^eb^nti dhammadesana.m dhammabhuuta.m vaa kaara.na.m. ^b^abhaasitthaa^eb^ti avoca. ya.m panettha na vutta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanatthattaa ca na vuttanti veditabba.m.
